channel.title: CVE Feed for WAGO -- Telecontrol Configurator
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WAGO -- Telecontrol Configurator

item.title: CVE-2023-5188|2023-12-14T14:09:31.201Z -- wago -- telecontrol%20configurator
item.description: The MMS Interpreter of WagoAppRTU in versions below 1.4.6.0 which is used by the WAGO Telecontrol Configurator is vulnerable to malformed packets. An remote unauthenticated attacker could send specifically crafted packets that lead to a denial-of-service condition until restart of the affected device.
